decoder-config:
This decoder configuration file is based my Zimo_MX63_MX64H_v22-30.xml V 1 file, dated 20071110. With some changes to Output naming to be consistent with Jeff Schmaltz' MX69/MX690 file.
Based on the "SW-Version 4 2007 08 01" English version of the ZIMO MX620 decoder manual (with thanks to Art Luescher of ZIMO Agency of North America for the translations!) Also added changes from the "SW-Version 6 2007 11 01" German version (by someone who does not read German).
This decoder XML is meant to be used with the "Comprehensive" programmer format. Continued the practice of using unrelated "item" names to place Zimo unique variables on the proper pane of the Comprehensive programmer.
